The chunk represents the initial import section of the OnscreenGeom module, which defines a class for managing on-screen geometric objects in a 2D scene graph using Panda3D's NodePath and DirectObject from DirectShowbase. This context situates the code within a framework for handling geometry display and event-driven object management in a graphical application.

"""OnscreenGeom module: contains the OnscreenGeom class"""

__all__ = ['OnscreenGeom']

from panda3d.core import NodePath, VBase3
from direct.showbase.DirectObject import DirectObject
